text: 300px Stephen Philip Cohen (1936 – October 27, 2019) was an American political scientist and professor of security studies. He was a prominent expert on Pakistan, India, and South Asian security, He was a senior fellow in foreign policy studies at the Brookings Institution and an emeritus professor at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. He authored, co-authored or edited at least 12 books, and named as one of America's 500 most influential people in foreign affairs, and was a fixture on radio and television talk shows. ==Education== *B.A., M.A., University of Chicago *Ph.D., University of Wisconsin-Madison ==Selected bibliography== * * * * * * * * == See also == *The Idea of Pakistan ==References== ==External links== * Brookings Institution profile * * A complete review of Stephen P.
